name: Knife Master! - Throw Darts Shooting Training Game
name_original: Knife Master! - Throw Darts Shooting Training Game
description:
"Knife Master!" is a simple and funny knife shooting simulator game.
In this game,the poor little pet teddy bear has trussed up on a turning wheel,only you can save her.

Show your shoot skills and accuracy to hit all targets.

Remember,all kinds of fruits on the turning wheel are your targets!

Take control of a knife thrower and aim carefully and not hurt...or KILL the bear.

Good luck!
